allSaves.value: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

details.flavorText: As bizarre in appearance as they are ferocious, thrasfyrs resemble six-limbed bears with bull-like horns, draconic scales, and a fire-breathing serpent for a tail. Every thrasfyr is wrapped in animated chains psychically linked to the creature's mind.

description.value: The thrasfyr always treats the plane it is located on as its home plane.

This monster regains the listed number of Hit Points each round at the beginning of its turn. Its @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Dying]{Dying} condition never increases beyond @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Dying]{Dying} 3 as long as its regeneration is active. However, if it takes damage of a type listed in the regeneration entry, its regeneration deactivates until the end of its next turn. Deactivate the regeneration before applying any damage of a listed type, since that damage might kill the monster by bringing it to @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Dying]{Dying} 4.
The thrasfyr's serpent tail breathes a blast of flame in a 50-foot cone, dealing [[/r 10d12 # fire damage]] fire damage (DC 40 basic Reflex save). It can't use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds.

The thrasfyr designates one creature as its rider by touching the rider with its claw. The thrasfyr and rider can communicate with each other telepathically at any range on the same plane and are aware of each other's present state, direction from each other, distance from each other, and any conditions affecting either.

The thrasfyr thrashes its chains in all directions. Each creature in a 15-foot emanation takes [[/r 18d6 # bludgeoning damage]] bludgeoning damage (DC 38 basic Reflex save); creatures that fail are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Immobilized]{Immobilized} until the start of the thrasfyr's next turn. The thrasfyr can't use Tangling Chains or make chain Strikes for 1d4 rounds.

The thrasfyr makes a jaws Strike, a horn Strike, and two claw Strikes, each against a different target. Each attack counts toward the thrasfyr's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after all the attacks.

The monster can use Knockdown as a free action triggered by a hit with its initial attack.
Effect The monster knocks the target prone.

description.label: Description
description.value:
You and the targets are instantly transported to any location within range, as long as you can identify the location precisely both by its position relative to your starting position and by its appearance (or other identifying features). Incorrect knowledge of the location's appearance usually causes the spell to fail, but it could instead lead to teleporting to an unwanted location or some other unusual mishap determined by the GM. Teleport is not precise over great distances. The targets appear at a distance from the intended destination equal to roughly 1 percent of the total distance traveled, in a direction determined by the GM. For short journeys, this lack of precision is irrelevant, but for long distances this could be up to 1 mile.

Heightened You and the other targets can travel to any location within 1,000 miles.

Heightened You and the other targets can travel to any location on the same planet. If you travel more than 1,000 miles, you arrive only 10 miles off target.

Heightened You and the other targets can travel to any location on another planet within the same solar system. Assuming you have accurate knowledge of the location's position and appearance, you arrive on the new planet 100 miles off target.

Heightened As the 9th-level version, but you and the other targets can travel to any planet within the same galaxy.

target.label: Target
target.value: you and up to 4 targets touched, either willing creatures or objects roughly the size of a creature.

description.label: Description
description.value:
You can see @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Invisible]{Invisible} creatures and objects. They appear to you as translucent shapes, and they are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Concealed]{Concealed} to you.

Heightened The spell has a duration of 8 hours.

description.label: Description
description.value: The target can walk on air as if it were solid ground. It can ascend and descend in this way at a maximum of a 45-degree angle.
